Add New NVR Device

Device Name

Sample : 본사정문

  • 1~30 characters (including numbers & special characters)
Mac
  • Not available blank
Serial Number

Sample : 001C843D38E7

  • 1~30 characters (including numbers)
Device ID

Sample : vgadmin

  • 1~30 characters (including numbers)
  • Not available blank & special characters
Device Password

Sample : qwer471212

  • 1~30 characters (including numbers & special characters)
Camera Port # (Multiple)

Sample : 1,3,5,15

  • Only numeric, Separate by comma
